admission.title: Admissions
admission.subtitle: Join our educational community and start your journey with us.

process.title: Admission Process
process.subtitle: Simple steps to join our school community

step1.title: Application Form
step1.description: Complete and submit the online application form with all required information.

step2.title: Document Submission
step2.description: Submit all required documents including academic records and certificates.

step3.title: Assessment
step3.description: Participate in our assessment process designed to understand your child's needs.

step4.title: Interview
step4.description: Attend a personal interview with our admission committee.

step5.title: Admission Decision
step5.description: Receive admission decision and complete enrollment procedures.

requirements.title: Admission Requirements
requirements.subtitle: What you need to apply
requirements.ageInfo: Students must meet the minimum age requirements for their respective grade levels as per educational board guidelines.

fees.title: Fee Structure
fees.subtitle: Transparent and affordable education
fees.note: Fee structure may vary by grade level. Contact us for detailed information.

cta.title: Ready to Apply?
cta.subtitle: Start your journey with us today. Apply now and become part of our educational family.

about.title: About Our School
about.subtitle: Discover our journey, mission, and commitment to educational excellence since 1995.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: To provide quality education that nurtures young minds, develops critical thinking skills, and prepares students for success in an ever-changing world. We are committed to fostering a learning environment that promotes academic excellence, character development, and social responsibility.
mission.description2: Our dedicated faculty and staff work tirelessly to ensure that every student receives personalized attention and support to reach their full potential.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading educational institution that inspires lifelong learning, cultivates global citizens, and empowers students to make positive contributions to society through innovation, creativity, and ethical leadership.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: A journey of educational excellence spanning nearly three decades.

founded.title: Founded in 1995
founded.description: Our school was established with a vision to provide quality education to the local community. Starting with just 50 students and 5 teachers, we have grown into a thriving educational institution.

growth.title: Continuous Growth
growth.description: Over the years, we have expanded our facilities, enhanced our curriculum, and embraced modern teaching methodologies. Today, we serve over 450 students with a dedicated team of 25+ qualified teachers.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest standards in education and personal development.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We uphold honesty, transparency, and ethical behavior in all our actions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new ideas and technologies to enhance the learning experience.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: We welcome and celebrate diversity, ensuring every student feels valued.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work together as a community to achieve common goals.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We take ownership of our actions and their impact on others.

leadership.title: Leadership Team
leadership.subtitle: Meet the dedicated leaders who guide our educational mission.

principal.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
principal.description: With over 20 years in education, Dr. Johnson leads our school with passion and vision.

vicePrincipal.name: Mr. David Wilson
vicePrincipal.description: An experienced educator focused on curriculum development and student success.

academicDirector.name: Ms. Emily Chen
academicDirector.description: Dedicated to maintaining high academic standards and innovative teaching methods.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.subtitle: Become part of our educational family and experience the difference quality education makes.
